short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple collection of CSS generators for web designers and developers.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple to use collection of css generators for web designers and developers to generate valid css code. It includes css3 filter effects, border radius, box shadow, text shadow, rgba, multiple columns, box resize, outline, transform generators and more.
